New Records: Boston Celtics set a single-game franchise record with 29 made 3-pointers, tying the NBA all-time high for 3-pointers in a game
Key Match Events: Celtics' season opener where they broke multiple 3-point shooting records against the Knicks
Post-Match Reflections: Knicks head coach Tom Thibodeau and players reacted to the loss, acknowledging the Celtics' performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Defensive missteps by the Knicks led to the Celtics' historic shooting performance
